logentry.msg: * moved a test to test dir * replaced some hardcoded /home/ values

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: oscom pub now mirrors what is in use at oscom.org/matrix

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg:
further cleanup
* changed to xalan * cleaned menus * cleaned lucene sitemap

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added a note about the fact that you have to use the local.*.properties from ./src/cocoon to build your cocoon. Otherwise you'll get problems with the cron block. This fixes #24738.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Merged some usability fixes from the unicom pub over: * requred fields * note about allowed values * warning about duplicate document-ids

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added a warning in the screen that no special chars are allowed when renaming a document ( a '/' in the new document-id will lead to an exception). This is a workaround for bug #24610 which is non-trivial to fix and will therefore be punted to 1.4

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Rename the submit menu to "Submit for review".

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: using DOMSource and DocumentBuilder with EntityResolver to avoid external HTTP lookup

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added dcterms to exclude-result-prefixes so that it is no longer that zealous with namespaces. Fixes #24618

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Adapted the tutorial to the new menu structure and added a user alice as an reviewer. This will give a nice balance as we have a man (lenya) doing the authoring and a woman doing the reviewing.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Remove the scheduler menu entry from the Help section since the functionality is now in the scheduler tab in the site area and since a click on the menu causes an exception.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The publishing usecase now uses the fallback module to find the xslt. This allows for publication specific publishing xslts. This is used e.g. in the bloging pub to remove the scheduling parts of the screen. Fixes #24857

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Adapted a relative path to make sure it also works in the context of a publication.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Moved the publication specific publication screen from xslt/publishing to lenya/xslt/publishing.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Moved the one-form editor to a separate pipeline so we can do specific error handling for it. The sax-parsing exception (that can occur if you enter non-validating xml in the one-form editor) is now handled and a nice error screen is rendered.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Add an error screen for the sax-parsing exception which can happen in the one form editor if non-validating xml is entered.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Added a specific publishing screen to the blog pub which does not have the scheduler stuff in it.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Removed the obsolete usecase upload (which is only used in unipublic), updated the usecase docu and updated the default pub to refer to the asset upload usecase.

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg:
old bxe removed more old crap removed

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: Make sure internal calls comming from the usecase sitemap are directly handled by the publication sitemap.

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: There is now an additional step in the asset usecase (called "showdots") which does an internal call to cocoon://{publication-id}/lenya-image-upload/{area}/{uri}. This internal (and publication specific) pipeline is then responsible for displaying the image upload dots.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: added the notion of task success or failure

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: change the image / asset upload usecases

logentry.author: egli
logentry.msg: The exception handling is now merged from the unicom publication, i.e. you'll get a nice error page if a document has not been published yet and you'll get the normal exception stack trace in all other cases (where we are looking at real bugs). Fixes #24224.

logentry.msg: Use the namespace of the document-element instead of the document-declaration (which is removed by the addMetaData xslt). This fixes bug #24617.

Added a new version of xml-forrest-components.jar (plus License file) which contains the SourceTypeAction, which is needed to determine the document-type.
Also removed the old version of xml-forrest-components.jar in the docs-new/WEB-INF directory.
